name: Linda Balon Stein
text: First visit to Hungry Howie's and was very impressed. They have 4 slice 8" pizzas, the garlic crust was delicious. Was 15 minutes walking in to leaving w pizza. Customized with black olives and mushrooms. Definitely will return.

name: Tim Clubb
text: Place was not busy. Ordered my pizza and they said it would be about 15 minutes.  Two others came placed and received their order.  About 30 minutes later I went to the counter and my pizza was on the rack.  They gave me the pizza and it was barely warm.

name: MoneyyDogg
text: I‚Äôve used the 84 location for 6 years. Never had any problems. Last year this locations staff have fallen completely apart. I‚Äôve given them multiple chances thinking ‚Äúmaybe it was just a new guy making the pizza‚Äù but no, I live 1 mile from ‚Ä¶More

text: This has always been our favorite place but I will never use them again after tonight. They sent me wrong pizza when I called to correct mistake I was told manager was too busy to speak to me. So I was like fine I will pay for another pizza and was told well in order to have another delivered it will be another hour. Nope no thank you
